Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed near Kimball
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing near Kimball due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing near Kimball due to police activity.

Shuttle buses have been requested to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#81 Lawrence

#78 Montrose

#80 Irving Park

#152 Addison

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
